description: Variation of conditions 2 (Approved Plans) and 4 (Front Turning and Parking Space) of planning permission reference H/03531/14 dated 06/11/14 for 'Two storey rear extension to incorporate the enlargement of 6 x 1Bedroom flats. Roof extension involving 3no. front dormer windows, 3no. rear dormer windows, 1no side dormer window (South), 1no. side dormer window (North) to provide space for 1 x 1 bedroom flat and 1 x 2 bedroom flat.  Creation of 8 parking spaces, refuse and recycling facilities to rear  and cycle storage to side of the property.' Variation to include alterations to car parking and changing the wording of condition 4 to read 'The front turning and parking space shall be provided and marked out within the site in accordance with a scheme to be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority within 3 months of the date of this permission.  That area shall not thereafter be used for any purpose other than the parking and turning of vehicles'
